properties.name: proxy.host
properties.description: Internet proxy host name

properties.name: proxy.port
properties.description: Internet proxy port

properties.name: sync.rate
properties.description: Fixed rate (in msec) the sync task is scheduled

properties.name: sync.auditEventRepositoryCapacity
properties.description: Number of entries stored in cirular buffer of InMemoryAuditEventRepository

properties.name: keycloak.server-url
properties.description: URL of Keycloak server

properties.name: keycloak.realm
properties.description: Security realm in Keycloak

properties.name: keycloak.client.id
properties.description: ID of client in Keycloak realm

properties.name: keycloak.client.secret
properties.description: Secret of client in Keycloak realm

properties.name: keycloak.per-page
properties.description: Number of entries per page in REST API calls

properties.name: gitlab.server-url
properties.description: URL of GitLab server

properties.name: gitlab.private-token
properties.description: Private access token of user with admin permission in GitLab

properties.name: gitlab.per-page
properties.description: Number of entries per page in REST API calls

properties.name: gitlab.group.search
properties.description: IDP-specific pattern (with optional wildcard character '%') used in IDP group search

properties.name: gitlab.group.reg-exp
properties.description: Java RegExp pattern to extract the following named groups from IDP group name: 'group' path of GitLab group, 'permission' name of GitLab permission

properties.name: gitlab.sync.excluded-users
properties.description: Comma-seperated list of GitLab user names to be excluded from syncing

properties.name: gitlab.sync.remove-project-members
properties.description: Remove all project members which are no group members

properties.name: gitlab.provider.name
properties.description: ID of GitLab provider, e.g. 'ldapmain' for the LDAP provider 'main'

properties.name: gitlab.provider.uid-attribute
properties.description: Name of IDP user attribute which holds the UID of the external federation provider, e.g. 'LDAP_ENTRY_DN' for Keycloak's LDAP user federation provider

properties.name: sync.enabled-apps
properties.description: List with IDs of application which should be used in SyncTask (use '*' for all applications)

properties.name: idp.factory
properties.description: Full qualified name of factory class for creating an identity provider instance

properties.name: idp.config.server-url
properties.description: URL of identity provider

properties.name: idp.config.realm
properties.description: Realm name of identity provider

properties.name: idp.config.client.id
properties.description: Client name of identity provider

properties.name: idp.config.client.secret
properties.description: Client secret of identity provider

properties.name: idp.config.per-page
properties.description: Number of entries per response from identity provider
